question.body: What hormone(s) are produced by the posterior pituitary?

response.feedback: Incorrect. ADH is stored by the posterior pituitary but it is produced by the hypothalamus.
Incorrect. Oxytocin is stored by the posterior pituitary but it is produced by the hypothalamus.
Incorrect. Prolactin is produced by the anterior pituitary.
Correct. The posterior pituitary does not produce any hormones. It only stores hormones produced by the hypothalamus.
